text: Læa yang pracha cha ti sa mu tnan rea di sng sx læa hˌ sung pen phinxng khxng phwk khea pi khea klaw wa xo prachachati khxng chan cng khearph sakkara xallxhˌ theid mimi phu thi khwr di rab kar khearph sakkara dı «sahrab phwk than xik læw xun cak phraxngkh nænxn di mi hlakthan xan chadcen cak phracea khxng phwk than mayang phwk than læw ni khux xuth tawmeiy khx ngxallxhˌ nı thana pen sayyan hnung sahrab phwk than dangnan phwk than cng plxy man kin nı phændin khx ngxallxhˌ theid læa cng xya tæatxng man dwy kar tharay dı «ley ca pen hetu hıkar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb khra phwk than seiy
